Class DiscardPile

java.lang.Object
DiscardPile
public class DiscardPile extends Object
The DiscardPile class represents a pile of discarded Card objects. Can be created from an existing array of cards or as an empty pile. Provides methods for adding cards, removing specific cards, removing all cards, checking the size, and returning the pile as an array.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DiscardPile()
    Constructs an empty discard pile with no cards.
    DiscardPile(Card[] cards)
    Constructs a DiscardPile using the provided array of cards.

  • Constructor Details

    • DiscardPile

      public DiscardPile(Card[] cards)
      Constructs a DiscardPile using the provided array of cards. Any null card inside the array is ignored.
      Parameters:
      cards - - the array of cards used to create the discard pile
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if cards is null

    • DiscardPile

      public DiscardPile()
      Constructs an empty discard pile with no cards.

  • Method Details

    • getCards

      public Card[] getCards()
      Returns all cards currently in the discard pile as an array.
      Returns:
      an array containing all cards in the pile

    • size

      public int size()
      Returns the amount of cards in the discard pile.
      Returns:
      the size of the pile

    • addCard

      public void addCard(Card card)
      Adds a card to the discard pile.
      Parameters:
      card - - the card to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if card is null

    • removeCard

      public Card removeCard(Card card)
      Removes the specified card from the discard pile and returns it. If the card does not exist in the pile, returns null.
      Parameters:
      card - - the card to remove
      Returns:
      the removed card, or null if not found
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if card is null

    • removeAll

      public Card[] removeAll()
      Removes and returns all cards in the discard pile. If empty, returns an empty Card array.
      Returns:
      an array containing all removed cards

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a formatted string listing all cards in the discard pile. Cards are separated by commas, and the last card ends with a period.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representing all the cards in the pile
